CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 21, 1964, pg. 8, reads: "50th Anniversary - Mr. and Mrs. Early Carpenter celebrated their 50th wedding anniversary recently by renewing their wedding vows, at Friendship Baptist Church. The Rev. E. James Dyson officiated.  The couple received many gifts and money, plus a pineapple decorated with silver dollars.  Mrs. Pearl McCoy (left), sister of Mrs. Carpenter, flew here from California to attend the celebration. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Pearl McCoy and Early Carpenter helping Mrs. Carpenter down steps in Friendship Baptist Church, during their 50th wedding anniversary celebration
